CUSTOMER_QUESTION: How do I reset my password?
DOCUMENTATION: Password Reset Instructions: Visit acme.com/reset and enter your email address. You'll receive a reset link within 5 minutes. Links expire after 24 hours.
Hours of Operation: Monday through Friday, 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM Eastern Time. We are closed on weekends and major US holidays.
Refund Policy: Full refunds are available within 30 days of purchase for unused products. Contact support@acme.com with your order number to initiate a refund.

CUSTOMER_QUESTION: What payment methods do you accept?
DOCUMENTATION: Payment Options: We accept Visa, Mastercard, American Express, and PayPal. All transactions are processed securely through Stripe.
Contact Us: Email support@acme.com or call 1-800-ACME-HELP during business hours. Average response time is under 4 hours.

CUSTOMER_QUESTION: What's the status of my order?
DOCUMENTATION: Order Tracking: Log into your account at acme.com/orders to view real-time order status and tracking information.
Shipping: We currently ship to the United States and Canada. International shipping to other countries is not available at this time.
No documentation available for this query.

CUSTOMER_QUESTION: Tell me about your competitor's pricing
DOCUMENTATION: Product Catalog: Acme widgets start at $29.99. Premium widgets are $49.99. Enterprise pricing available on request.

CUSTOMER_QUESTION: My widget arrived broken. What do I do?
DOCUMENTATION: Damaged Items: If your product arrived damaged, email support@acme.com with photos within 7 days of delivery. We'll send a replacement at no charge.
